content: i designed this bun to be whipped up quickly and something that even beginner s could have fun with it uses the continuous spiral technique the clever bit in my humble opinion is that i popped some cloves in with the stuffing and it smells wonderful you could also pop some in the outside as it is a sweet little pomander these are a cute car freshener desk decoration pin cushion or fridgie enjoy putting cross back into easter c crochetroo australia true blue hooker
